publisher: The Art of Electronics, Second Edition, by Paul Horowitz and Winfield Hill
title: Books Electronics For Dummies, First Edition, by Gordon McComb and Earl Boysen
— A good book to start with; provides an introduction to electronics concepts, components, circuits, and methods
— Useful reference book for designing circuits as well as understanding the functionality of existing circuits
— While this is intended for ham radio enthusiasts, it is also a useful reference book for understanding circuit design
Electronics Projects For Dummies, First Edition
— Provides an introduction and hands-on practice in building electronic circuits and projects
